name: @kevinoid/eslint-config
description: ESLint shareable config for @kevinoid's style (based on airbnb).
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.lint: npm run lint-ec && npm run lint-es && npm run lint-rules
scripts.postpublish: git push --follow-tags origin master && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md
scripts.preversion: check-audit && depcheck --ignores eslint*,greenkeeper-lockfile && david && git-branch-is master && travis-status -b master -c -w -x
scripts.test: npm run test-peer-versions-ci && npm run lint && npm run test-eslint
scripts.test-eslint: echo | eslint --no-eslintrc -c ie11.js --stdin && echo | eslint --no-eslintrc -c node.js --stdin && echo | eslint --no-eslintrc -c webextensions.js --stdin && echo | eslint --no-eslintrc -c wsh.js --stdin
scripts.version: npm run changelog && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install conventional-changelog-cli david depcheck git-branch-is npm-audit-resolver travis-status
